DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate bioequivalence Mylan 's topiramate sprinkle 25 mg capsule Ortho-McNeil 's Topamax® Sprinkle 25 mg capsule follow single , oral 25 mg ( 1 x 25 mg ) dose administer fed condition .
DOC.brief_title: Fed Study Topiramate Sprinkle Capsules 25 mg Topamax® Sprinkle Capsules 25 mg
DOC.criteria: healthy , adult subject , 18 year older able swallow medication institutionalized subject history significant disease use prescription OTC medication within 14 day start study receive investigational product within 30 day prior start study
